alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 14 at 7:22PM CDT until March 14 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Henderson County in central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 721 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Purtis Creek State Park, or 10 miles north of Athens, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Gun Barrel City, Canton, Grand Saline, Chandler, Van, Frankston, Brownsboro, Eustace, Berryville, Fruitvale, Edom, Coffee City, Purtis Creek State Park, Murchison, Poynor and Moore Station. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 520 and 542. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
